title: How does nature maintain a balance between living beings? - Quora

response.answer_text: It doesn’t. When things go out of balance, everything involved in the process dies out. In fact, the most balanced Nature gets is when there is zero life, which is the vast majority of the Universe. Right now the balance of life is not … life is very unbalanced. We are the biggest unbalancing influence which is why we need to intervene in Nature to keep things going. This is why conservation is a thing. What we see as a “balance of life” in Nature is just what evolution does.
